Answer: Web searches are as good as any source if you just want to see who is out there and what they are investing in.  You should note, though, that cold calling investors has a very low success rate.  That is ok, it just means a lot of work and time on your part.If you can find out who some of the people you want to meet are, and then explore your own network to try and find a connection to them, that will up your odds somewhat.
